Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory283.png'}
{3: 'You are now entering an abandoned residential area...'}
{3: 'Projections and the Corrupted coexist and roam the area.'}
{2: "Let's look into these projections first.", 3: '7'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "It'd be great to be able to collect more data, but a record this huge and complicated is going to take us quite some time to look into.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "I ran a search with information of the Ascendants and Huaxu but I wasn't able to find anything. We can really use information that's more detailed.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'All these projections and the Corrupted here, though. Could this be a sign of something?', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'It could be, but of what?', 4: '1'}
{2: "Lee, what's your thought?", 3: '15', 4: "Lucia, let's get rid of them all!", 5: '18', 6: 'Liv, do you recall anything?', 7: '24'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'As I said, a record this huge and complicated would take quite some time to calculate.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "The Spear of F.O.S. isn't turning up anything with the information we have. It's only giving us this sea of data.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Let's see what Liv has to say.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Sure. Let's keep fighting, Commandant!", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Hold on! But we came here for leads!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'The record is only going to get bigger and more complicated if we destroy all the Corrupted here!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Let's see what Liv has to say.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: '...Um. Let me think about it.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Most of these Corrupted bodies are new. The only ones with dust on them are placed high up.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'I think these Corrupted only got here recently.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'So, something drew them here, or maybe the Ascendants summoned them.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Correct, and the remains on the ground have been recycled.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Uhm... Why did they only recycle the ones on the ground, though?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The four of you think for a bit to no avail. You will just need to keep looking for clues.'}
